name: SLIPUZZLE
description:
■ Various play modes, characters and plenty of collections

■ Old school sliding puzzle with new interpretation

□ [Game Description]
※ You can explore more than 200 stages and 8 different themes such as fantasy world, travel and animal themes, etc.

※ 4 uniquely designed game modes provide hundreds of collections.

※ Standard number tile puzzles as well as newly introduced shape tile puzzles give you another challenge.

※ Collectable characters with unique abilities help you solve the puzzles.

※ Feature game quality and volume.

□ [Game Characteristics]
※ Puzzle Mode
Complete the puzzle within the given number of movements.

※ Battle Mode
Compete with A.I

※ Theme Mode
Complete the puzzle as shown in the navigator

※ Rank Mode
Complete the puzzle as fast as possible

[Notice]
The game progress is not saved on the server.
Please note that if deleting the game, your save data is deleted as well.
